title: City of Dreams
description: An assassination attempt triggers a dirty power struggle between the Gaikwad siblings. With the throne at stake, the lines blur between moral and immoral.

title: Teddy
description: When a loner crosses paths with a live teddy bear, the unusual duo sets off on an adventurous ride to uncover a devious scam and save lives.

title: Comedy Stars
description: Some of the best comedians of Kerala present hilarious, side-splitting sketches on relevant day-to-day topics.

title: Triples
description: Three besties, one dream café. It's anything but a cakewalk with shifty employees, angry politicians, crazy loan sharks and exes with whys.

title: Kasthooriman
description: Instead of doubling their joy, birth of their twins made Kavya and Jeeva part ways. Will the little angels be able to reunite the once-happy couple ever again?

title: 1962: The War in the Hills
description: In the Sino-Indian War, 126 Indians defended a strategic pass against 3,000 enemy soldiers. This was a battle of dauntless courage, fought to the last bullet.

title: Priyamanasam
description: Dubbed version of Ishqbaaaz, it is a story about three brothers - Shiva, Omkara and Rudra - who share an unbreakable bond despite their dysfunctional family.

title: Mounam Sammatham Season 2
description: A happy-go-lucky girl Asha is caught in a love-hate relationship with Ashok, a chauvinist. Find out what happens when these two cross each other's paths.

title: Out of Love
description: A loving husband, a perfect marriage, a secret affair. Caught in a web of lies and infidelity, Dr. Meera Kapoor has to make a choice: forgive, forget or fight.

title: Bigg Boss Kanakazhchakal
description: An exclusive sneak peak into the house with unseen footage and final goodbyes from evicted contestants. Tune in for an extra dose of entertainment!

title: Mahabharath
description: Watch the rivalry of the Pandavas and Kauravas culminate in the Kurukshetra war, driven by the razor-sharp strategies of Krishna, the master puppeteer.

title: Kailasanathan
description: In this mesmerising story of Lord Shiva and his avatars, witness the dynamic Shiva as a sansarik or a householder.

title: Vezhambal
description: Avni is the illegitimate child of Ashish and Asha. Having overcome all obstacles - mainly her grandmother, Rajeshwari - Avni is now grappling with the matters of the heart, involving Neeraj and Ali.

title: Deshiyapuraskarathode Marakkar
description: Mohanlal, Priyadarshan and Antony Perumbavoor chat candidly about creating their National Award-winning masterpiece Marakkar: Arabikadalinte Simham.

title: Chandanamazha
description: Urmila mentors her daughter-in-law Amrutha, and transforms her into a confident woman. But things can never be picture perfect in a joint family, can they?

title: 101 nu Oppam
description: 101 nu Oppam is a Malayalam talk show on Asianet. A special event to celebrate the success of blockbuster Malayalam movie Oppam starring Mohanlal and baby Meenakshi in lead roles. Watch full episodes of 101 nu Oppam on Hotstar.

title: Star Singer
description: One of the most prestigious singing reality shows is back with a brand new season. Get set for a melodious battle as new talents dazzle you with their charisma.

title: 1232 KMs
description: Weeks after the nationwide COVID-19 lockdown, seven migrant labourers, on the verge of starvation, decided to go to their village just like millions of others.

title: Vanambadi
description: Anumol's passion for music knows no bounds and she finally meets her estranged father, the renowned singer Mohan Kumar. Will Mohan ever realise the truth?

title: Sanjeevani
description: A blast from the past makes Ishani restart her medical practice and regain her faith in love. Will she succeed?

title: Parasparam
description: A loving husband and a self-made man, Sooraj helps his ambitious wife Deepthi achieve her dreams.

title: Start Music
description: Arya is back with a bang! The musical game show featuring celebrity contestants is here again to make your weekends super-entertain

title: Mounam
description: Mounam Sammatham is a romantic drama on Asianet Plus, about Khushi, a simple innocent girl, who is caught in a love-hate relationship with Arnav, an arrogant businessman.

title: Bhoomi
description: Bhoominathan has a pressing mission on Earth just before he steps on Mars. This NASA astronaut will stop at nothing for the farmers of his native village.

title: Taste Time
description: This unusual cookery show is not restricted to a studio or a single chef. Shot like a travelogue, Taste Time is a feast for the senses. Watch all the latest episodes of Taste Time on Hotstar.

title: Roar of the Lion
description: M.S. Dhoni, a legend with many stories. But this story unravels his career's darkest phase - the ban on Chennai Super Kings and the mother-of-all comebacks.

title: Seethayanam
description: Seethayanam is a Malayalam mythological show on Asianet. It is the classic epic of Ramayana retold through the eyes of the righteous, beautiful and brave Sita and her immense love for Ram!

title: Karuthamuthu
description: Karthika's journey of becoming a perfect wife, daughter-in-law and a mother was a rollar-coaster ride. How would life unfold for her daughter Balachandrika?

title: Snehapoorvam Somuvinu
description: A special event to pay tribute to the late singer Somadas, who rose to fame with Star Singer and Bigg Boss S2, a bright star taken away too soon.

title: Hridhayathil Sookshikkaan
description: Hridhayathil Sookshikkaan is a Malayalam romantic drama aired on Asianet Plus. It is the dubbed version of the Hindi show, Dil Boley Oberoi. After facing dejection in love, Omkara vows never to fall in love again. However, a chance encounter with Gauri, a runaway bride, changes his life. Watch all the episodes of this show on Hotstar.

title: Asianet Film Awards
description: Asianet Film Awards is the most prestigious award ceremony, a luring spectacle with the stalwarts of Malayalam filmdom.

title: Asianet TV Awards
description: The much-awaited Asianet Television Awards is finally here! So gear up for an evening high on dance and masti, as your favourite celebrities bring the house down with their enthralling performances.

title: Swami Ayyappan
description: Born with the powers of Shiva and Vishnu, here’s a beautiful re-telling of the tales of the divinity called Swami Ayyappan.

title: Bharya
description: Nandan and Nayana fall in love and get married. As Nayana creates a rift within the family, Nandan struggles to restore the once happy household.

title: Kerala Kitchen
description: Get set to challenge your taste buds as your all-time favourite host Sadhika brings to you a whole new bunch of lip-smacking recipes.

title: Sthreedhanam
description: Divya, daughter-in-law of the Palat family is tortured by her greedy mother-in-law for dowry. How will she tackle her in-laws while being a perfect wife?

title: Amma
description: Amma follows the struggles a young girl faces when she is torn away from her family, while her heartbroken mother continues to look for her lost child.

title: Mounam Sammatham 5
description: Mounam Sammatham 5 is a Malayalam romantic drama on Asianet Plus. Ishita gets hitched to Raman for his daughter Ruhi's sake, but will they ever give love a chance?  Watch latest full episodes of Mounam Sammatham 5 online on Hotstar.

title: Kumkumapoovu
description: Believing her father's lies, Jayanthi gets convinced to marry another person. What happens when she crosses paths with her illegitimate daughter, Shalini?
